turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to make an order for pick up for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande black and white moca please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! What store did you want to pick this up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 4th street in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, let me prepare your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so just to double check you wanted a black and white moca?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande sized?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want anything added to it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, lets add milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Adding milk to your order? Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually yeah, throw some whipped cream in there too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Adding whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, could you run that back with me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, you wanted a Grande sized black and white Mocha with milk and whipped cream. Correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, I'm going to finalize your order assuming everything is correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go right ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, just a second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order should show up on your phone and it'll be ready to pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome? Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, I hope you enjoy your coffee!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day
